permit.oneOrMore: You must bid at least one permit
permit.moreThanOffered: You cannot bid more permits than offered in the auction
permit.moreThanAvailable: You cannot bid more than available permits. Please check the bid table

bid.oneOrMore: You must bid at least one QAR
bid.minBid: Bid must be greater than or equal to the minimum bid
bid.exists: You already have a bid for this amount in the table, please edit it instead of adding a new one

Timestamp.string: {key} should be a string, received {received} instead
Timestamp.isoTimestamp: {key} should be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp (for example: 2021-01-01T00:00:00Z), received {received} instead)

name.string: User name should be a string, received {received} instead
name.words: User name should have at least 1 words, received {received} instead

email.string: User email should be a string, received {received} instead
email.email: User email should be a valid email, received {received} instead

phone.string: User phone number should be a string, received {received} instead
phone.length: User phone number should be 8 digits long, received {received} instead

image.string: User profile picture should be a string, received {received} instead
image.url: User profile picture should be a valid URL, received {received} instead

emailVerified.boolean: Email verified should be a boolean, received {received} instead

isActive.boolean: Is active should be a boolean, received {received} instead

UserType.picklist: User type should be 'admin' or 'user', received {received} instead

Uuid.string: {key} should be a string, received {received} instead
Uuid.uuid: {key} should be a valid UUID (for example: 123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000), received {received} instead

energy.alt: Image of a power plant depicting the energy category
energy.title: Energy

description.register: This sector includes all entities producing or supplying energy. Permits apply to emissions from sources like power plants, renewables, or electricity grids.

industry.alt: Image of a crusher machine depicting the industry category
industry.title: Industry

description.register: This category is relevant to companies in manufacturing and processing sectors, such as steel, cement, and chemical producers.

transport.alt: Image of traffic causing pollution depicting the transport category
transport.title: Transport

description.register: Designed for logistics, freight, aviation, and public transport operators, this sector manages permits tied to fuel-based emissions across all transport modes.

buildings.alt: Image of a HVAC system depicting the buildings category
buildings.title: Buildings

description.register: For real estate developers, property managers, and facility operators, this category covers emissions permits for building energy use, HVAC systems, and lighting.

agriculture.alt: Image of a farm with cows depicting the agriculture category
agriculture.title: Agriculture

description.register: Agricultural producers, agribusinesses, and food processors fall under this sector, with permits covering emissions from livestock, fertilizers, and land use.

waste.alt: Image of waste glass and plastic depicting the waste category
waste.title: Waste

description.register: Waste management firms—including landfill operators and recyclers—can acquire permits here for emissions from waste decomposition and treatment.

bidConfirmationModal.title: Place Your Bid(s)
bidConfirmationModal.description: You are about to place the following bids, review your bids before placing them. Once placed, you cannot edit or delete the bids.

header.title: Bidding Table
header.subtitle: Add your bids to the table below. When you're ready, click the "Place Bids" button to submit them all at once.
header.bidders: Active Bidders: {value, plural, =0 {# Bidders} =1 {1 Bidder} other {# Bidders}}

insertForm.title: Insert Bids
insertForm.description: Insert your bids to the bidding table using the form below

error.title: There was a problem adding your bid

insertForm.subtext: Pressing the above button will not submit your bid. It will only add it to the table on the left

cta.tooltip: Confirm each item in the bidding table and place all bids

endedOverlay.title: This Auction Has Ended
endedOverlay.description: You cannot participate in this auction anymore as it has ended. You can choose to take a look at the results, or view the page in read-only mode

joinOverlay.title: Join The Auction
joinOverlay.description: You must first join the auction to participate in the bidding process. Click the button below to join.

upcomingOverlay.title: This Auction Has Not Started Yet
upcomingOverlay.description: You cannot participate in this auction yet as it has not started. Please check back later once the auction is live.

deleteBidModal.title: Delete Your Bid(s)
deleteBidModal.description: Are you sure you want to delete the following bids? This action cannot be undone.

bids.title: Bids Table
bids.info: View all bids placed on this auction, including your own and the winning bids

winnings.title: Your Current Winnings
winnings.info: Estimated number of permits you will win based on the current winning bids

sealed.title: Results are currently unavailable
sealed.description: The auction results will be released after the auction ends and all bids have been processed.

else.title: You have not joined the auction yet
else.description: Please join the auction to see your estimated winnings.

editBidModal.title: Edit Your Bid
editBidModal.description: You can edit your bid by changing the number of permits and the price per permit. Please ensure that your new bid does not exceed the available permits.

error.title: There was a problem editing your bid

permit.label: Permits to Bid (Originally {value, number} {value, plural, =0 {permits} =1 {permit} other {permits}})

ended.title: This Auction Has Ended
ended.description: You cannot participate in this auction anymore as it has ended. You can choose to take a look at the results, or view the page in read-only mode
ended.overlay: Viewing the page in read-only mode

loser.title: No Permits Awarded
loser.subtitle: You did not win any permits in this auction. However, you may still view the bidding history and analyze the auction results.
loser.subtext: Check out some similar auctions that you might be interested in:

ongoing.title: Results Not Yet Available
ongoing.subtitle: The auction is still ongoing. Results will be available once the auction ends and all bids have been processed.

unjoined.title: You Have Not Joined This Auction
unjoined.subtitle: Please join the auction to view results and participate in bidding.

footer.subtext: Clicking "Continue" will bring you to the checkout page where you can learn what to do next and claim your permits

summary.title: Final Bill
summary.subtext: Scroll down to view the bids used for calculation

upcoming.title: This Auction Has Not Started Yet
upcoming.description: This auction does not have any results yet as it has not started. Please return to the auction page and check back later once the auction is live.

live.title: This Auction Is Still Ongoing
live.description: You can take a look at the results, but please note that they are not final and may change as the auction is still active.

auctionCarousel.error: There was an error loading the auctions. Please try again later.
auctionCarousel.empty: There are no auctions available at the moment. Please check back later.

review.tooltip: Review this company's details and either approve or reject their application

invitationModal.title: Review Company Application
invitationModal.description: Review the account summary below and  decide whether to approve or reject the application. If approved, an invitation will be sent to the company to join the ETS platform.

rejectionModal.title: Reject Company Application
rejectionModal.description: Are you sure you want to reject this company application? The user will be notified with the reason you provide.

reason.label: Rejection Reason
reason.description: Please provide a reason for rejecting this application. The user will be notified with this reason.

newRegistrations.title: Newly Registered Companies
newRegistrations.tooltip: Number of new companies that registered this month

approvalRate.title: Approval Rate
approvalRate.tooltip: Percentage of applications approved this month

unpaid.title: Total Unpaid Transactions
unpaid.tooltip: Total number of transactions that are unpaid this month

sectorDiversity.title: Sector Diversity Index
sectorDiversity.tooltip: Measures how diverse the sectors of the newly registered companies are, calculate using Shannon's Diversity Index

presets.heading: Manage Cycle Presets
presets.subheading: Click here to add, edit, or delete cycle presets

auctions.subheading: View all auctions created, including those in draft states

kpis.title: Average KPI Achievement

totalCycles.title: Total Auction Cycles
totalCycles.tooltip: Total number of auction cycles created this year

register.error: There was an error during registration, make sure the token is valid

lib.notLoggedIn: You must be logged in to access this resource.

join.error: There was a problem joining the auction

invite.error: There was an error inviting this company to the ETS platform.

success.title: Invitation Successfully Sent

applications.exists: An application with the same CRN or email already exists

approve.error: There was an error approving the application

reject.error: There was an error rejecting the application

onboarding.heading: Activate Your Account
onboarding.subheading: Please create a password to complete your registration and activate your account.

details.prompt: Verify the above information before proceeding. If you feel that any of the information is incorrect, please contact us.

actions.prompt: Activating your account will log you in and redirect you to the marketplace.

error.title: There was an error registering your account
error.message: There was an error during registration, please view the console for more details.

subheading.first: Please complete the following steps to register your account.
subheading.second: Please select the sectors your company operates in. This is used to determine which auctions you can participate in.
subheading.third: Please provide the details of the primary representative for your company. This person will be the main point of contact for your account.
subheading.fourth: Please review the details below to ensure everything is correct before proceeding.
subheading.fifth: Your application is currently under review by our admins. You will receive an email once your account is approved.

message.label: Message
message.description: Leave a message for the admins to review your application. This is optional.

error.message: There was an error during registration, please view the console for more details.

actions.prompt: Please note the email may take a few minutes to arrive.

forgot.heading: Forgot Your Password?
forgot.subheading: No worries! Just enter your email address and we'll send you a link to reset it (valid for 24 hours)

login.heading: Login to ETS
login.subheading: Welcome to the ETS platform, where you can trade carbon credits and manage emissions.

error.message: There was an error logging in, please view the console for more details.
error.title: There was an error logging in

error.message: There was a problem verifying your OTP, please view the console for more details.
error.title: There was an error verifying your OTP

otp.heading: OTP Verification
otp.subheading: Verify your identity by entering the OTP sent to your email address.

success.title: Verification Email Resent
success.message: Another email has been sent with your new OTP code

steps.label: Basic Information
steps.description: Set the name and duration of this auction cycle

header.heading: Set Up Auction Cycle
header.subheading: Start by giving your auction cycle a clear name and selecting the date range during which it will be active.

date.label: Start and End Dates
date.placeholder: Select the start and end date for this auction cycle...

steps.label: Team Assignment
steps.description: Assign internal teams or managers to oversee this cycle

header.heading: Assign Responsible Teams
header.subheading: Choose which admins will be responsible for this auction cycle and related activities, such as creating and managing auctions, distributing permits, and analysing statistics

manager.heading: Cycle Manager
manager.subheading: Responsible for overseeing the auction cycle and managing planning and execution activities

viewResponsibilities.label: View Responsibilities
viewResponsibilities.tooltip: View what permissions and responsibilities this role has and what actions they can take

operator.heading: Auction Operator
operator.subheading: Responsible for setting up and configuring auctions, including setting dates, minimum bid, and other auction parameters.

allocator.heading: Permit Strategist
allocator.subheading: Responsible for deciding how many free permits to distribute based on regulatory goals, sector performance, or national policy.

auditor.heading: Auditor
auditor.subheading: View-only access for inspecting data, logs, and compliance during the cycle.

finance.heading: Finance Officer
finance.subheading: Has access to finances for auction cycle and handles payment-related activity

steps.label: Define KPIs (Optional)
steps.description: Set target metrics to track the performance of this cycle

header.heading: Define Performance Targets (Optional)
header.subheading: Optionally set targets for key performance indicators (KPIs) to track progress and measure the success of this cycle.

totalPermits.label: Total Permit Inflow
totalPermits.tooltip: How many permits should be distributed and auctioned off in this auction cycle?

avgPerAuction.label: Average Permits Per Auction
avgPerAuction.tooltip: How many permits should each auction have on average?

avgFree.label: Average Free Permits Per Company
avgFree.tooltip: Set the target average number of permits each company should be given for free

avgWon.label: Average Permits Won Per Company
avgWon.tooltip: How many permits on average should each company win during this cycle?

revenue.label: Total Revenue
revenue.tooltip: How much revenue should be generated during this auction cycle

avgWinningBid.label: Average Winning Bid
avgWinningBid.tooltip: How much should the average winning bid be in QAR

avgTotalPayment.label: Average Total Cost Per Company
avgTotalPayment.tooltip: Decide how much each company should expect to pay on average during this auction cycle

totalFirms.label: Total Companies Participating
totalFirms.tooltip: Set how many companies you expect to participate in this auction cycle

avgJoinedAuctions.label: Average No. of Auctions Joined Per Company
avgJoinedAuctions.tooltip: How many auctions should each company join on average?

percentWinners.label: Average Auction Winning Percentage
percentWinners.tooltip: The percentage of participating companies who end up as winners in an auction

percentWinning.label: Average Company Winning Rate
percentWinning.tooltip: Set expected winning rate of companies during this auction cycle (i.e, how many of their joined auctions they should win)

avgBidsAuction.label: Average No. of Bids Per Auction
avgBidsAuction.tooltip: How many bids should be placed on average per auction

avgBidsFirm.label: Average No. of Bids Per Company
avgBidsFirm.tooltip: How many bids on average should each company place on a single auction

holdingTime.label: Average Permit Holding Time
holdingTime.tooltip: Decide the average time each company should take between acquiring a permit obtained in this cycle, until actually using it

percentCarryOver.label: Average Percent Carry-Over
percentCarryOver.tooltip: What percentage of the permits acquired in this cycle are companies expected to carry over to the next cycle, measures hoarding and stockpiling

percentResold.label: Average Percent Resale
percentResold.tooltip: Shows how often companies resell permits rather than use them

expiryRate.label: Average Percent Expiry Rate
expiryRate.tooltip: Set the expected average percentage of permits that end up expired without being used

steps.label: Review & Create
steps.description: Review all settings and create the auction cycle

help.title: Having trouble with the form?
help.description: Feel free to reach out to us for assistance. We are here to help you with any issues you may face during this process.
